name: Roo.grid.CellSelectionModel
desc: This class provides the basic implementation for cell selection in a grid.

params.name: config
params.desc: The object containing the configuration of this model.

config.name: listeners
enter_is_tab
config.desc: Enter behaves the same as tab. (eg. goes to next cell) default: false

methods.name: hasSelection
methods.desc: Returns true if there is a selection.

params.name: field
params.desc: (not used) - as it's normally used as a listener

params.name: e

returns.desc: The selected cell (row, column) or null if none selected.

params.name: true
params.desc: to prevent the gridview from being notified about the change.

methods.name: isLocked
methods.desc: Returns true if the selections are locked.

methods.name: purgeListeners
methods.desc: Removes all listeners for this object

methods.name: on
methods.desc: Appends an event handler to this element (shorthand for addListener)

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The method the event invokes

params.name: scope
params.desc:
(optional) The scope in which to execute the handler
function. The handler function's "this" context.

params.name: options
params.desc: (optional)

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The handler to remove

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the handler

methods.name: addEvents
methods.desc: Used to define events on this Observable

params.name: object
params.desc: The object with the events defined

methods.name: releaseCapture
methods.desc: Removes all added captures from the Observable.

params.name: o
params.desc: The Observable to release

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The handler to remove

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the handler

methods.name: fireEvent
methods.desc: Fires the specified event with the passed parameters (minus the event name).

params.name: args
params.desc: Variable number of parameters are passed to handlers

returns.desc: returns false if any of the handlers return false otherwise it returns true

methods.name: hasListener
methods.desc: Checks to see if this object has any listeners for a specified event

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The name of the event to check for

returns.desc: True if the event is being listened for, else false

methods.name: capture
methods.desc: Starts capture on the specified Observable. All events will be passed to the supplied function with the event name + standard signature of the event before the event is fired. If the supplied function returns false, the event will not fire.

params.name: o
params.desc: The Observable to capture

params.name: fn
params.desc: The function to call

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the fn

methods.name: addListener
methods.desc: Appends an event handler to this component

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The method the event invokes

params.name: scope
params.desc:
(optional) The scope in which to execute the handler
function. The handler function's "this" context.

params.name: options

events.name: beforeeditnext
events.desc:
Fires before the next editable sell is made active
You can use this to skip to another cell or fire the tabend
   if you set cell to false

params.name: eventdata
params.desc: object : { cell : [ row, col ] }

events.name: cellselect
events.desc: Fires when a cell is selected.

params.name: rowIndex
params.desc: The selected row index

params.name: colIndex
params.desc: The selected cell index

events.name: tabend
events.desc:
Fires when the tab (or enter) was pressed on the last editable cell
You can use this to trigger add new row.

events.name: selectionchange
events.desc: Fires when the active selection changes.

params.name: selection
params.desc:
null for no selection or an object (o) with two properties
  • o.record: the record object for the row the selection is in
  • o.cell: An array of [rowIndex, columnIndex]

events.name: beforerowselect
events.desc: Fires before a cell is selected.

params.name: rowIndex
params.desc: The selected row index

params.name: colIndex
params.desc: The selected cell index
